enWisdom: Works are [only] accomplished by the [right] workers

Wisdom: احْرُسْ مَنْزِلَتَكَ عِنْدَ سُلْطَانِكَ وَاحْذَرْ أَنْ يَحُطَّكَ عَنْهَا التَّهَاوُنُ عَنْ حَفْظِ مَا رَقَاكَ إِلَيْهِ
enWisdom: Guard your position near your king, and be cautious of not being lowered from it by negligence towards that which raised you to it

Wisdom: أَلِقْ دَوَاتَكَ وَأَطِلْ جِلْفَةَ قَلَمِكَ وَفَرِّقْ بَيْنَ سُطُورِكَ وَقَرْمِطْ بَيْنَ حُرُوفِكَ فَإِنَّ ذَلِكَ أَجْدَرُ بِصَبَاحَةِ الْخَطِّ
enWisdom: Put cotton in your inkpot, keep the nib of your pen long, leave space between your lines and keep the letters close to each other, for this makes the writing more beautiful

Wisdom: أَطِعْ مَنْ فَوْقَكَ يُطِعْكَ مَنْ دُونَكَ وَأَصْلِحْ سَرِيرَتَكَ يُصْلِحِ اللَّهُ عَلَانِيَتَكَ
enWisdom: Obey the one who is above you and the one who is under you will obey you; rectify your inner self and Allah will rectify your outer state
The bane of works is the inability of the workers

Wisdom: تَوَلِّي الْأَرَاذِلِ وَالْأَحْدَاثِ الدُّوَلَ دَلِيلُ انْحِلَالِهَا وَإِدْبَارِهَا
enWisdom: The sovereignty of the vile and inexperienced over nations is the cause of their decline and regression
The worst of rulers is one who is feared by the innocent

Wisdom: شَرُّ الْوُزَرَاءِ مَنْ كَانَ لِلْأَشْرَارِ وَزِيراً
enWisdom: The worst of viziers is one who is a vizier to the vicious

Wisdom: كَذِبُ السَّفِيرِ يُوَلِّدُ الْفَسَادَ وَيُفَوِّتُ الْمُرَادَ وَيُبْطِلُ الْحَزْمَ وَيَنْقُضُ الْعَزْمَ
enWisdom: The lies of an envoy give rise to corruption, cause the failure of the intended objective, nullify judiciousness and invalidate firm resolution
Whoever is betrayed by his vizier, his administration gets corrupted

Wisdom: وُزَرَاءُ السَّوْءِ أَعْوَانُ الظَّلَمَةِ وَإِخْوَانُ الْأَثَمَةِ
enWisdom: Evil viziers are the helpers of tyrants and the brothers of wrongdoers
Seeking power [and sovereignty] is from the deceptions of Satan
